oneOf.description: Wakes the state machine up. The caller should check the sender of the tick is the clock if they'd like to pause when the clock does.
Tells the LPer to withdraw his position Should only be called by the holder of the covenant

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
